description: curly maple stock and barrel support, brass butt plate, trigger guard, ram rod holders, muzzle and hinged load cover on stock; engraved silver thumb plate top of stock; incised and carved scroll work, carved griffin and silver eagle on stock, double trigger
dimension: a (rifle): H.10-1/4 x W.2-3/8 x D.60-3/4 in. (overall); b (ram rod): L.44-3/4 x Dia.7/16 in.
title: Flintlock Kentucky Rifle
